message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with recovery and repair schemes for regenerating codes, which are commonly used in distributed storage systems. This falls under the information theory (cs.IT) sub-category. The paper also proposes a procedure for solving a system of shift-XOR equations, which can be of interest to the computer science (cs.DS, cs.DC) and networking (cs.NI, cs.SI) communities.
